# dataSource

**Instance Property**

The preview panel data source.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var dataSource: (any QLPreviewPanelDataSource)! { get set }
```

## Managing the Preview Items

- **reloadData()**: Asks the preview panel to reload its data from its data source.
- **refreshCurrentPreviewItem()**: Asks the preview panel to recompute the preview of the current preview item.
- **currentPreviewItemIndex**: The index of the current preview item.
- **currentPreviewItem**: The currently previewed item.
- **displayState**: The preview panel’s display state.
